text: Gary Ray Bowles (January 25, 1962 - August 22, 2019) was an American serial killer. He was sentenced to death for the murder of six men in 1994. He was born in Clifton Forge, Virginia. He was convicted of sexual assault, armed robbery and murder. Bowles was executed by lethal injection on August 22, 2019 at Florida State Prison in Bradford County, aged 57.Gary Ray Bowles: Florida executes killer who preyed on gay men ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Executed American serial killers Category:People executed by lethal injection Category:American sex offenders Category:People from Virginia Sexual
title: Gary Ray Bowles
